info.name: Dreamwidth for Widescreen
info.description: Modified from style 20511 by user 27142.  Widens pages in the default site scheme (Tropospherical) including the homepage, inbox, comment pages, etc.  Also adds a justify effect to text in this scheme.  (If you don't like this effect, just delete the whole line "text-align: justify !important;" to get rid of it.)
